content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Bo Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Hello, Bo Li. It's a pleasure to have you here. I'm sure you'll find the apartment quite charming. Let's indeed discuss the rental price. What would you consider a fair price for this 25-square-meter space?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Mister Heine, I'm looking for a place that's both comfortable and affordable. Considering the size and the location, I would say a price around 1,200 Euro per month would be reasonable. Does that sound acceptable to you?
name: Bo Li from China

content: Bo Li, your offer of 1,200 Euro per month is quite reasonable, given the size and location of the apartment. I believe it's a fair price. Would you agree to the price of 1,200 Euro?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 1,200 Euro. Thank you, Mister Heine, for offering such a fair price. I'm looking forward to renting this apartment from you.
name: Bo Li from China

content: Excellent! I'm glad we've reached an agreement, Bo Li. The apartment will be yours at a rate of 1,200 Euro per month. I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay. If there's anything else you need assistance with, please let me know.
name: Heinrich Heine
